com.stoyanr.mastermind

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIOPlayer, DefaultPlayer, ReaderWriterPlayer

    public interface Player
    Interface to be implemented by players. A player interacts with an Algorithm within a Game by providing scores for the guesses made by the algorithm.
    Author:
    Stoyan Rachev

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endGame(boolean won, int roundsPlayed)
      Ends the game for the player.
      Score getScore(String guess)
      Gets the score for the given guess.
      void startGame()
      Starts the game for the player.

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        void startGame()
        Starts the game for the player. This method is invoked by Game.play() before the game actually starts. It gives the player a chance to perform initialization, display messages, or carry out other preparation activities.

      • endGame

        void endGame(boolean won,
           int roundsPlayed)
        Ends the game for the player. This method is invoked by Game.play() after the game has finished. It gives the player a chance to perform clean-up, display messages, or carry out other finalization activities.
        Parameters:
        won - true if the game has been won, false otherwise.
        roundsPlayed - The number of rounds played during the game.

      • getScore

        Score getScore(String guess)
        Gets the score for the given guess. This method is invoked by Game.play() repeatedly for each guess made by the Algorithm. The returned score is passed back to the algorithm via the Algorithm.putGuessScore(String, Score) method.
        Parameters:
        guess - The guess to provide a score for.
        Returns:
        The score for the passed guess.
